n=0;

new graph 1 {0,0};
/*
0
*/



	
n=1; 

new graph 7 {0,2} {0,3} {1,3} {1,4} {2,5} {3,5} {3,6} {4,6}; 
/*	
  2
0	5
  3
1   6
  4
*/


n=2; 

new graph 12 {0,2} {0,3} {1,3} {1,4} {2,5} {3,5}
 {3,6} {4,6} {5,7} {5,8} {6,8} {6,9} {7,10} {8,10} {8,11} {9,11}; 
/*	
  2   7
0	5   10
  3   8
1   6   11
  4   9
  */
